title: Small business visits and radio ads

content.question: A small business owner has created a linear regression model to predict the number of new customers who will visit a shop based on the number of times the owner has an advertisement played on the radio. What is the explanatory variable and what is the response variable?

choices.label: Explanatory: number of new customers; response: number of times the advertisement is played
Explanatory: number of times the advertisement is played; response: number of new customers
Explanatory: number of times the advertisement is played; response: number of purchases made by customers
Explanatory: number of purchases made by customers; response: number of times the advertisement is played
Explanatory: number of previous customers; response: number of new customers

content.answer: Explanatory: number of times the advertisement is played; response: number of new customers
